attributes.action: appoint an ombudsman to investigate complaints about vets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
my dog was deliberatly harmed by a vet during what was supposed to be a routine spay operation , she was left blind,brain damaged(not during surgery)  suffered a dislocated jaw and a broken canine tooth also her hips were dislocated , these injuries were caused by the vet performing a procedure for which he had no consent and done without any anasthetic or painkillers.my dog's life has been changed forever.my complaint to the vets received no responce.my complaint to the rcvs was closed as they told me that the vet had done nothing wrong and they considered all the injuries to be a normal part of a routine spay.
since this happened I have heard of many more incidents that have also been reported to the rcvs and no vets have been punished.
I never thought it would happen to my dog, don't think it wont happen to your pet.
I also beleive the overcharging needs to be addressed
